items.text: A Song of degrees of David.
items.plainText: A Song of degrees of David.

items.text: LORD, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.
items.plainText: LORD, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.

items.text: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.
items.plainText: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.

items.text: Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
items.plainText: Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
